item.description:
Friday October 22nd, Drinks & Dancing!

Let's meet at the Tavern for drinks before going out, then Havana club for a lesson and a night of dancing.

Get to know one another over drinks before going out: 8pm inside The Tavern, Central Square

Location: 730 Massachusetts Ave. Cambridge, MA

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

At 8:45 we'll walk over to the Havana Club together for a night of dancing!

Havana Club Class Starts @: 9:00-10:00 Beginner & Intermediate Salsa Lessons

No Partner Required.

Beginners Very Welcome!

10pm-1am Salsa dance party.

Location: 288 Green Street, Central Square, Cambridge

Cover: $12, admission includes lesson, party, coat check, etc.

Website: http://havanaclubsals...



Tavern in the Square

Tavern in the Square is a neighborhood restaurant & bar focusing on great food & beverage, sports, entertainment, atmosphere and outstanding service. For more info visit:

www.taverninthesquare.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing my black fedora hat like always, shouldn't be hard to find.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Drinks and Dancing !! Tavern then Havana Club !!!
